summary: Created 4 README.md files documenting Metalogic subdirectories: Completeness (completeness hierarchy), Algebraic (alternative Lindenbaum-Tarski approach), Compactness (compactness theorem), and Core (MCS foundations). All follow established format with Overview, Modules table, Key Definitions, and cross-references.

artifacts.summary: Completeness hierarchy documentation (weak -> finite strong -> infinitary)
Algebraic approach documentation using Lindenbaum-Tarski algebra
MCS foundations and deduction theorem documentation
